languages.text: "Что?.." {n}Лицо Ирлиэт вытягивается от удивления, а слова наполняются печалью:{/n} "Откуда в столь забытом богами месте камни душ моих братьев? Элантах, позволь мне позаботиться о них".

traits.locale_text: "Что?.." {n}Лицо Ирлиет вытягивается от удивления, а слова наполняются печалью:{/n} "Откуда в столь забытом богами месте камни душ моих братьев? Элантах, позволь мне позаботиться о них".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "What?.." {n}Yrliet's face betrays her surprise. When she speaks, there is sadness in her words:{/n} "How could the spirit stones of my kin end up in such a gods-forsaken place? Elantach, please, allow me to watch over them."
languages.original_text: "Что?.." {n}Лицо Ирлиэт вытягивается от удивления, а слова наполняются печалью:{/n} "Откуда в столь забытом богами месте камни душ моих братьев? Элантах, позволь мне позаботиться о них".

traits.locale_text: "What?.." {n}Yrliet's face betrays her surprise. When she speaks, there is sadness in her words:{/n} "How could the spirit stones of my kin end up in such a gods-forsaken place? Elantach, please, allow me to watch over them."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What?.." {n}Yrliet's face betrays her surprise. When she speaks, there is sadness in her words:{/n} "How could the spirit stones of my kin end up in such a gods-forsaken place? Elantach, allow me to take care of them."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What?.." {n}Yrliet's face betrays her surprise. When she speaks, there is sadness in her words:{/n} "How could the spirit stones of my kin end up in such a gods-forsaken place? Elantach, please, allow me to watch over them."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What?.." {n}Yrliet's face betrays her surprise. When she speaks, there is sadness in her words:{/n} "How could the spirit stones of my kin end up in such a gods-forsaken place? Elantach, please, allow me to watch over them."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What?.." {n}Yrliet's face betrays her surprise. When she speaks, there is sadness in her words:{/n} "How could the spirit stones of my kin end up in such a gods-forsaken place? Elantach, please, allow me to watch over them."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「何…？」{n}ユリエットは驚きとは裏腹の表情を浮かべていた。彼女の言葉にはどことなく悲しさが含まれている。{/n}「なぜ我が血族の魂縛石が神に見放されたような地にあるのだ？エランタ、お願いだ。彼らを見守らせてほしい」
languages.original_text: "What?.." {n}Yrliet's face betrays her surprise. When she speaks, there is sadness in her words:{/n} "How could the spirit stones of my kin end up in such a gods-forsaken place? Elantach, please, allow me to watch over them."

traits.locale_text: 「何…？」{n}ユリエットは驚きとは裏腹の表情を浮かべていた。彼女の言葉にはどことなく悲しさが含まれている。{/n}「なぜ我が血族の魂縛石が神に見放されたような地にあるのだ？エランタ、お願いだ。彼らを見守らせてほしい」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «¿Qué?...». {n}El rostro de Yrliet revela su sorpresa. Cuando continúa, la tristeza de sus palabras es aparente:{/n} «¿Cómo es posible que las joyas espirituales de mis hermanos hayan acabado en este antro? Elantach, por favor, permite que cuide de ellas».
languages.original_text: "What?.." {n}Yrliet's face betrays her surprise. When she speaks, there is sadness in her words:{/n} "How could the spirit stones of my kin end up in such a gods-forsaken place? Elantach, please, allow me to watch over them."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué?...». {n}El rostro de Yrliet revela su sorpresa. Cuando continúa, la tristeza de sus palabras es aparente:{/n} «¿Cómo es posible que las joyas espirituales de mis hermanos hayan acabado en este antro? Elantach, por favor, permite que cuide de ellas».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “什么……？”{n}伊莉耶特难以掩饰惊讶的表情。当她开口时，她的语气中带着一丝悲伤。{/n}“我的族人的灵魂石怎么会流落到这个该遭天谴的地方？外界人，请把石头交给我看管吧。”
languages.original_text: "What?.." {n}Yrliet's face betrays her surprise. When she speaks, there is sadness in her words:{/n} "How could the spirit stones of my kin end up in such a gods-forsaken place? Elantach, please, allow me to watch over them."

traits.locale_text: “什么……？”{n}伊莉耶特难以掩饰惊讶的表情。当她开口时，她的语气中带着一丝悲伤。{/n}“我的族人的灵魂石怎么会流落到这个该遭天谴的地方？外界人，请把石头交给我看管吧。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Quoi ? » {n}L'expression d'Yrliet trahit son étonnement, mais quand elle reprend la parole, c'est la tristesse qui semble habiter sa voix :{/n} « Comment des pierres-esprits de mon peuple ont-elles pu se retrouver dans un lieu si reculé ? Elantach, je vous prie, laissez-moi les mettre à l'abri. »
languages.original_text: "What?.." {n}Yrliet's face betrays her surprise. When she speaks, there is sadness in her words:{/n} "How could the spirit stones of my kin end up in such a gods-forsaken place? Elantach, please, allow me to watch over them."

traits.locale_text: « Quoi ? » {n}L'expression d'Yrliet trahit son étonnement, mais quand elle reprend la parole, c'est la tristesse qui semble habiter sa voix :{/n} « Comment des pierres-esprits de mon peuple ont-elles pu se retrouver dans un lieu si reculé ? Elantach, je vous prie, laissez-moi les mettre à l'abri. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Was?" {n}Yrliet steht die Überraschung ins Gesicht geschrieben. Als sie spricht, liegt große Trauer in ihrer Stimme:{/n} "Wie können die Seelensteine meiner Verwandtschaft an einen so götterverlassenen Ort geraten? Elantach, bitte, gestattet mir, über sie zu wachen."
languages.original_text: "What?.." {n}Yrliet's face betrays her surprise. When she speaks, there is sadness in her words:{/n} "How could the spirit stones of my kin end up in such a gods-forsaken place? Elantach, please, allow me to watch over them."

traits.locale_text: "Was?" {n}Yrliet steht die Überraschung ins Gesicht geschrieben. Als sie spricht, liegt große Trauer in ihrer Stimme:{/n} "Wie können die Seelensteine meiner Verwandtschaft an einen so götterverlassenen Ort geraten? Elantach, bitte, gestattet mir, über sie zu wachen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ne?.." {n}Yrliet'in şaşkınlığı yüzünden okunuyor. Konuşurken sesindeki hüzün duyuluyor.{/n} "Soydaşlarımın ruh taşları nasıl olur da tanrıların unuttuğu bu yere düşer? Lütfen Elantach, müsaade et de onlara göz kulak olayım."
languages.original_text: "What?.." {n}Yrliet's face betrays her surprise. When she speaks, there is sadness in her words:{/n} "How could the spirit stones of my kin end up in such a gods-forsaken place? Elantach, please, allow me to watch over them."
